project_descr: Security Gap Project: Ensure that the DPII properly equipped and enabled to provide quality services to the UN system; improved mobility, responsiveness, operational efficiency and morale in the DPII force through required equipment and infrastructure

outputs.output_descr: Directorate for the Protection of the International Institutions (DPII) properly equipped and enabled to provide quality services to the UN system; improved mobility, responsiveness, operational efficiency and morale in the DPII force through required equipment and infrastructure. Further, Capacity of Ministry of Interior/DPII to provide training and appropriate policy/procedural direction to deployed DPII personnel.

DPII properly equipped and enabled to provide quality services to the UN system; improved mobility, responsiveness, operational efficiency and morale in the DPII force through required equipment and infrastructure

Capacity of MOI/DPII to provide training and appropriate policy/procedural direction to deployed DPII personnel; support to the transition of APS to DPII and the recruitment, vetting and retention of DPII personnel
